Name: Nighthaunt Assassin
Story Background: Trained in the shadows of the haunted city, the Nighthaunt Assassin strikes fear into the hearts of their enemies.
Ability: When Nighthaunt Assassin enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with converted mana cost 2 or less.
Appearance Description: Clad in dark, tattered robes and wielding a gleaming dagger, the Nighthaunt Assassin moves with eerie grace, leaving only death in their wake.
